summary: Found 2 issues in webhook and subscription handlers.

findings.title: Missing webhook signature validation
findings.description: Incoming webhook requests are processed without validating provider signature headers.
findings.memory_reference: Validate provider signatures before processing webhook payloads
findings.suggested_fix: Verify signature with provider secret before parsing and handling event payloads.

findings.title: Retry loop lacks exponential backoff
findings.description: Subscription retry flow retries immediately without backoff, increasing duplicate request risk.
findings.memory_reference: Retry logic must use exponential backoff with jitter
findings.suggested_fix: Use capped exponential backoff with jitter between retry attempts.
